name: @rdlabo/ionic-theme-ios26
description: iOS26 CSS Theme for Ionic Framework

scripts.build: sass src/ios-design.scss css/ios-design.css && sass src/ion-list-inset.scss css/ion-list-inset.css
scripts.fmt: prettier --parser scss --write "./**/*.scss" && prettier --parser typescript --write "./**/*.ts" &&  prettier --parser angular --write "./**/*.html"

author: Masahiko Sakakibara <sakakibara@rdlabo.jp>
